.. _`pandas_histogram`:

PANDAS_HISTOGRAM
================

Plot a pandas histogram





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_pandas_hist:
        input:
            tsv = "table.csv"
        output:
            png = "hist.png"
        params:
            extra = {
                "column": "plot"
            }
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/pandas/hist"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* extra: dict of parameters to pass to pandas.DataFrame.hist()
